message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $16,500.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $16,000.
